cause.description:
This is pretty self-explanatory. Our work encompasses the entire world around us. We attempt to eradicate things that harm people including, but not limited to, AIDS, malaria, cancer, basically any disease, race discrimination, gender discrimination, discrimination of any kind, differences between people, weapons of mass destruction, weapons of any kind, rocks big enough to throw at people and cause anything more than momentary distraction, nature, industrialization, the Man-O-War jellyfish, sand (it gets in our vaginas), paper cuts, Paris Hilton, Michael Moore, world hunger, death, manbearpig, someone named "Nancy Grace," all "-isms," etc...
1. Bad things are not good
2. As such, they must stop happening immediately
cause.mission: To succumb to the popular notion that it is everyone's God-given right to live in a perfect world
cause.name: Stop Bad Things
